thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 9 of 657
thread.title: Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text:
Glasses ordered were as expected. After paying for the glasses, I was informed the glasses would be delivered a few weeks late due to the holiday season, not the standard delivery time frame promised.
Update: I received a call from customer service following up on the late delivery and given an apology and partial refund for the tardiness. 5 stars for the customer service team.
